gui.ux
Class NonNormPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gui.ux.NonNormPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuiInterface, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class NonNormPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, GuiInterface

Provides the user with the ability to start non-normative scenarios within the Factory simulation, such as damaging or disabling various parts of the factory.

Author:
David Tan
See Also:
Serialized Form
